trans-unit.source: Defines the modes in which classes derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase"></xref> perform their easing.
trans-unit.target: 定義類別衍生自模式<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase"></xref>執行其簡化。

trans-unit.source: The following graphs demonstrate the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: 下列圖表示範不同的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>，其中*f*(*t*) 表示的動畫進度和*t*代表時間。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase> ![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase> ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 ElasticEase。](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 ElasticEase。")</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ElasticEase>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase> ![不同加/減速模式的 ExponentialEase 圖形。](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "不同加/減速模式的 ExponentialEase 圖形。")</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ExponentialEase>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase> ![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase> ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。")</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase> ![QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes") <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase> ![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase> ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuadraticEase](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuadraticEase")<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase>![的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。") </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase>

trans-unit.source: ![SineEase for different EasingMode values](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase for different EasingMode values") ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ![使用不同 EasingMode 值的 SineEase](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "不同 EasingMode 值的 SineEase") # # XAML 屬性使用方式 ``` ```

trans-unit.source: Interpolation follows the mathematical formula associated with the easing function.
trans-unit.target: 插補遵循 easing 函式相關聯的數學公式。

trans-unit.source: Interpolation uses EaseIn for the first half of the animation and EaseOut for the second half.
trans-unit.target: 插補的動畫和 EaseOut 第二個半前半使用 EaseIn。

trans-unit.source: Interpolation follows 100% interpolation minus the output of the formula associated with the easing function.
trans-unit.target: 插補如下輸出減去 easing 函式相關聯的公式的 100%插補。
